protein.specific_function: Destroys radicals which are normally produced within the cells and which are toxic to biological systems.

go_class.description: oxygen and reactive oxygen species metabolic process
negative regulation of cholesterol biosynthetic process
negative regulation of neuron apoptotic process
regulation of T cell differentiation in thymus
